Working with data sources
In the System, you are able to create, edit and delete data sources (
Data source [RF_SOURCE]
).
The following data sources are configured:
SQL-based data source
, the
SQL-based data source
object type [RF_SQL_DATA_SOURCE]
Object data source
, the
Data source. Object data source
object type [RF_DATA_SOURCE]
After creating the data source (regardless of its type), the following buttons are available to work with it:
Button
Purpose
Creating a file to update the System. Learn more about working with updates:
Creating updates from the object profile
.
View data source (described below). Possible options:
In modal window;
In new tab;
In this window.
Viewing the data source is available to users with the "Run" permission for the corresponding data source instance.
Downloading a representation (report) of the data source (according to the settings of your browser).
Downloading a representation (report) of the data source (according to the settings of your browser). In this case, the data source profile will remain available for operation.
When viewing a data source
, the System will allow you to upload the generated report (representation of the source generated) in ''*.xlsx format''.
To add a new data source parameter, you need to specify:
For example, if the source contains a parameter â€“ a list of identifiers (ID) of car models (
see details about setting a parameter
), you will be able to see them and choose for display.
To limit data representation by parameter you need to link data source parameter with parameter of data filtering algorithm:
You are able to select reporting forms for display from a drop-down list:
Exporting the data source view is available to users with the "Run" permission for the corresponding data source instance.
